description: This header file declares the interface for the SSP message bus, including initialization, finalization, and resource management functions for the harvester component's message bus interactions.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_MessageBusEngage
methods.description: Engages or initializes the message bus with specified component ID, configuration file, and path.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the message bus interface with provided user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Finalize
methods.description: Finalizes or cleans up the message bus interface with provided user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_Buscheck
methods.description: Checks the status of the message bus with provided user data.

methods.name: ssp_Mbi_FreeResources
methods.description: Frees resources allocated during message bus operation with specified priority and user data.
